Wallpaper Design: Reconciliation of Venus and Psyche

label: Description
value: Venus and Psyche embracing at center of composition. Cupid leaning on Venus' throne looks on at right foreground.  Three unidentified maidens in right background.  Neoclassical architectural setting includes pavilion with Ionic columns and arcade with Doric columns.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, black, white chalk, brush and black ink on brown coated paper mounted to paperboard

label: Provenance
value: 1980: Sale Paris, Prouté, lot 71; 2 December 1987: Sale Paris Druout, lot 19; Didier Aaron, NYC; 1996: acquired by Museum

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of Mr. and Mrs. Christian H. Aall and from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Fund
